018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_GetterMustBeDEFAULT;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingGetter;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_NoMessagePrefix;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ResourceLocale;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_GetMessagePrefix;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.decapitalize;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
031
032import java.util.Locale;
033
034import org.apiguardian.api.API;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.ap.CodeGenerationError;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag;
038
039/**
040 *  <p>{@summary The
041 *  {@linkplain org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder code builder implementation}
042 *  for the generation of the code that let the configuration bean
043 *  implement the interface
044 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.I18nSupport}.}</p>
045 *
046 *  @version $Id: I18nSupportBuilder.java 933 2021-07-03 13:32:17Z tquadrat $
047 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
048 *  @UMLGraph.link
049 *  @since 0.1.0
050 */
051@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: I18nSupportBuilder.java 933 2021-07-03 13:32:17Z tquadrat $" )
052@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
053public final class I18nSupportBuilder extends CodeBuilderBase
054{
055        /*---------------*\
056    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
057        \*---------------*/
058
059        /*-----------*\
060    ====** Constants **========================================================
061        \*-----------*/
062
063        /*------------*\
064    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
065        \*------------*/
066
067        /*------------------------*\
068    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
069        \*------------------------*/
070
071        /*--------------*\
072    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
073        \*--------------*/
074    /**
075     *  Creates a new instance of {@code I18nSupportBuilder}.
076     *
077     *  @param  context The code generator context.
078     */
079    public I18nSupportBuilder( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
080    {
081        super( context );
082    }   //  I18nSupportBuilder()
083
084        /*---------*\
085    ====** Methods **==========================================================
086        \*---------*/
087    /**
088     *  {@inheritDoc}
089     */
090    @Override
091    public final void build()
092    {
093        final var configuration = getConfiguration();
094        final var messagePrefix = configuration.getMessagePrefix().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( MSG_NoMessagePrefix ) );
095
096        /*
097         * Create the field that tracks the locale for the current resource
098         * bundle.
099         */
100        final var resourceBundleLocaleField = getComposer().fieldBuilder( Locale.class, STD_FIELD_ResourceLocale.toString(), PRIVATE )
101            .addJavadoc( """
102                The
103                {@link Locale}
104                for the currently loaded
105                {@link ResourceBundle}.
106
107                @see #getResourceBundle()
108                """ )
109            .initializer( "$1L", "null" )
110            .build();
111        addField( STD_FIELD_ResourceLocale, resourceBundleLocaleField );
112
113        //---* Overwrite getMessagePrefix() *----------------------------------
114        final var propertyName = decapitalize( STD_METHOD_GetMessagePrefix.toString().substring( 3 ) );
115        final var propertySpec = configuration.getProperty( propertyName )
116            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingGetter, propertyName ) ) );
117        if( !propertySpec.hasFlag( PropertyFlag.GETTER_IS_DEFAULT ) )
118        {
119            throw new CodeGenerationError( MSG_GetterMustBeDEFAULT );
120        }
121
122        final var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( STD_METHOD_GetMessagePrefix.toString() )
123            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
124            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
125            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
126            .returns( String.class )
127            .addStatement( "return $1N", messagePrefix )
128            .build();
129        addMethod( STD_METHOD_GetMessagePrefix, method );
130    }   //  build()
131}
132//  class I18nSupportBuilder
133
134/*
135 *  End of File
136 */
